hero.title: Backpack Wander
hero.subtitle: Your partner for new paths
hero.services: Individual coaching | Web design | Digital strategy
hero.description: We support freelancers, expats, and visionaries in building their online businesses – authentic, multilingual, and future-oriented. We value clear strategies, creative freedom, and sustainable growth. Together, we design digital solutions that truly fit your needs. Your path to digital self-employment begins right here.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Empowering your personal and digital journey.

card1.title: Break Free & Redesign Life
card1.description: We help you escape the 9-to-5 and build a flexible, fulfilling life in the digital space — one aligned with your personal values and passions.

card2.title: Coaching Meets Creativity
card2.description: Through a holistic blend of coaching, creative direction, and digital tools, we empower you, your team, or your business to turn ideas into reality.

card3.title: Build A Life that Fits You
card3.description: Whether you're launching an online business, shaping your brand, or crafting your digital presence — we walk with you, helping you work remotely and design a life that truly fits.

cta.question: Ready to discover your next step?

beginSection.title: Where Do You Want to Begin?
beginSection.subtitle: Discover how we can support your journey – choose the path that fits your goals.

coaching.title: Coaching
coaching.description: Break free from the 9–5 and design a life you love.

digital.title: Digital Services
digital.description: Grow your brand with strategy, design & smart digital tools.
digital.button: Find Digital Solution For Your Needs

community.title: Community
community.description: You don't have to grow alone.

coaching.title: Business Coaching & Mentoring
coaching.description: From idea to launching business. Practical Support & Proven guidance.

webDesign.title: Web Design - BW Digit
webDesign.description: Beautiful, multilingual websites tailored to you. Visual appearances & user-friendly.

digitalMarketing.title: Digital Strategy & Marketing
digitalMarketing.description: SEO—Technical, On- & Off-site with quality backlinks. Social Media Marketing with results. Email & Content Marketing—done the human way. Effective strategies that will grow your brand.

community.title: Community & Network
community.description: Join a global group of creatives, founders & freelancers. We connect people who want to grow together.

workshops.title: Courses & Webinars - Set Free Way
workshops.description: Learn, grow and connect in digital world. Join our hands-on network with like-minded professionals.

visible.title: Make your idea visible.
visible.customVision: We help people escape the 9-to-5 routine. Our goal is freedom, flexibility, and purpose. We empower you to build digital businesses. Work remotely from anywhere in the world. Live life on your own terms.
visible.customMission: We build a global network of successful professionals. We help achieve financial independence through coaching. We provide digital expertise for business growth. We connect, share knowledge, and support each other. Friendship and community are our core values.

support.line1: We were in your shoes. It is not easy, but you are not alone!
support.line2: It is our pleasure to help you in everything you need.
support.line3: We are happy that you grow and thrive online with us!

intro.title: You are not alone on this journey!
intro.line1: We were in your shoes. It is not easy, but you are not alone!
intro.line2: It is our pleasure to help you in everything you need.
intro.line3: We are happy that you grow and thrive online with us!

visible.paragraph1: Are you ready to escape the 9-to-5 routine and unleash your full potential in the digital space? We believe in a life full of freedom, flexibility, and purpose.
visible.paragraph2: Whether you're an expat, self-employed, or entrepreneur, we'll accompany you every step of the way. With strategic coaching and proven digital solutions, we help you turn your vision into reality and achieve financial independence from anywhere in the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We build a global network of professionals achieving financial independence through coaching and digital expertise. We connect, help, share knowledge, and support each other.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We help people escape the 9-to-5 routine to live freely and purposefully. We empower you to build digital businesses and work remotely from anywhere in the world.

coaching.title: Book a free coaching session
coaching.subtitle: Unleash your potential – Free
coaching.description: Get personalized support to clarify your vision, overcome challenges, and take your next big step with confidence. This no-obligation session is ideal for expats, freelancers, and aspiring entrepreneurs looking to grow.

appointment.title: Our Services
appointment.subtitle: Custom Solutions for Your Business
appointment.webdev: Professional, responsive websites built with modern technologies for a perfect user experience across all devices.
appointment.custom: Custom web applications tailored to your specific business needs and workflows.
appointment.mobile: Mobile app development for iOS and Android to reach your customers wherever they are.
appointment.seo: Search engine optimization to improve your visibility and drive organic traffic to your site.
appointment.marketing: Digital marketing strategies to promote your brand and connect with your target audience.

community.title: Special Offer – Until July 31
community.subtitle: Get more for less!
community.description: Custom website + strategy + support at a reduced summer rate. SEO Analysis Free. Social Media Marketing. Hot Packages—All you need for Startup!

footer.tagline: Your partner for new paths in digital business, coaching, and web design.
footer.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and insights.

coaching.title: Business Coaching & Mentoring—8-week program
coaching.description: Transform your ideas into profitable digital ventures. Our business coaching provides tailored guidance to navigate the complexities of online entrepreneurship. You can choose the best course for you, together with a mentor during coaching.

webDesign.title: Web design & branding
webDesign.description: Tailor-made websites and visual appearances—multilingual & user-friendly. Websites that captivate and convert visitors into loyal customers. We create beautiful, responsive websites that represent your brand authentically.

marketing.title: SEO & Marketing
marketing.description: Social Media, Content and Advertising Marketing. Simple, human, and effective strategies that will grow your brand. Stand out with proven results. Our digital marketing approach combines SEO optimization, engaging social media campaigns, and targeted marketing.

community.title: WhatsApp group, meetups, webinars and workshops
community.description: We connect people who want to grow together. Join a supportive network of like-minded entrepreneurs and visionaries. Our community brings together digital nomads, freelancers, and business owners who share knowledge.

discoveryCall.description: Share some information about yourself and what you'd like to discuss. We'll get back to you to schedule a convenient time for your free discovery call.

privacyPolicyHeroSubtitle: Your trust and data security are paramount to us.
privacyPolicyCtaText: We're here to help. Contact us for any inquiries regarding your personal data and our privacy practices.

generalStatement.title: General Statement
generalStatement.content:
Your privacy is important to us.

Backpack Wander GmbH takes the protection of your personal data very seriously and adheres to the applicable data protection laws.

responsibleEntity.title: Responsible Entity
responsibleEntity.content:
Responsible body:
Backpack Wander GmbH
Ewaldstraße 28
45699 Herten
Germany
Email: info@backpackwander.com

useOfData.title: Use of Data
useOfData.content:
Use of data:

We use Google Analytics to analyze the use of our website and improve our services.
For newsletters and email marketing, we use MailerLite.
Your personal data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent - unless required by law.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to information, correction or deletion of your data at any time. If you have any questions about data protection, please contact us.

sidebarContact.description: Share the details of your project – like scope, timeframes, or business challenges.

termsAndConditionsHeroSubtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.
termsAndConditionsCtaText: Contact us if you have any questions about our terms and conditions.

generalTerms.title: General Terms
generalTerms.content:
These terms and conditions govern your use of our website and services.

By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

services.title: Our Services
services.content:
Backpack Wander GmbH provides digital business coaching, web design, and digital marketing services.

We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any service at any time without notice.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content:
Users must provide accurate information and use our services in compliance with applicable laws.

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by law.

We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
